description: Record more -- delete less. Add My DVR Expander from WD to your eSATA-ready DVR and you'll instantly have space for up to 120  hours of high-definition or 600 hours of standard-definition TV. Just plug it  in to record even more TV shows, sporting events and movies. It features cool,  quiet operation and a soft amber LED to help avoid annoyance at night, even in  the bedroom. Save your programs longer and never miss your favorite shows.  Active eSATA port required.  Firmware updates from Tivo that need to be downloaded  to Tivo boxes before they will work with our new DVR Expander.
title: Western Digital My DVR Expander 1 TB eSATA External Hard Drive
